Txt_Talk_ShrinePrison_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_011.Text: *: Wanderer<IfSolo(,s)>, you have found the Shrine of Shackles...loneliest of all prisons...

Txt_Talk_ShrinePrison_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_031.Text:
No reply.
It's just a corpse.

Txt_Talk_ShrinePrison_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_041.Text:
No reply.
It's just a corpse.

Txt_Talk_ShrinePrison_1F_MAIN_0_VOLUME_0.Text: *: I cannot die yet... Still so much to do...
*: What has become of my boy... And my ally Ortega...
*: Oh, friend... Please... Please forgive me...
I don't want you holding back now, alright?
Naturally!
Hmph... Tell me, are they all as strong as you in Aliahan?
In all my years I have never been pushed quite so hard in a duel.
You're not so bad yourself, you know. Sim√£o of Manoza, was it?
I'll call you...<6>friend<9>.
It's all my fault, Ortega... I am truly sorry...
Have there always been so many monsters around these parts?
Either way, might be best we put off returning to Manoza for now. It'd only cause more trouble in the end.
Agreed. No one else should have to suffer on our account.
Why don't we try splitting up for a while? That should make it harder for them to find us. At least, I hope it will...
Are you sure? If you follow this path, it could be some time till you see your family again. Ugh, I'm just...
...sorry.
Do not worry! I know they'll be fine.
Things have also been far from normal in the town of late. I'm going to keep my distance and see how everything unfolds.
Alright, I'll head off to prepare for the trek ahead. Look after yourself, friend.
Likewise. Whenever it is time for us to strike back, you will find me by your side. I swear this on the Mountaincleaver.
My reputation seems to precede me these days. There's no end to those after my life... Perhaps it's time I took on a new mantle...
Use my blade...to bring peace to the world... Please, my friend...
Hurl it... Hurl the Mountaincleaver into that blasted volcano...
{LEADER} notices that something seems to have been stuffed under the bed.
<IfGender_LEADER(He,She,)> decides to take a closer look.
{LEADER} obtains the Mountaincleaver!

Txt_Talk_ShrinePrison_1F_MAIN_0_ACTOR_08.Text: Hurl it... Hurl the Mountaincleaver into that blasted volcano...
